/pt/s/rluck/svmspy/results_svmspy_svmd_compare2011_0117.txt

Using svmd data in the svmspy model does seem to work:

19:27:41 SQL> SELECT
19:27:41   2  p.tkr
19:27:41   3  ,p.crr_l,p.crr_s
19:27:41   4  ,p.mn_date
19:27:41   5  ,p.ccount
19:27:41   6  ,p.mx_date
19:27:41   7  ,l.crr_l crr_l_svmd
19:27:41   8  ,s.crr_s crr_s_svmd
19:27:41   9  FROM sspy12 p, svmd_gl_crr_l l, svmd_gl_crr_s s
19:27:41  10  WHERE p.tkr = l.tkr
19:27:41  11  AND   p.tkr = s.tkr
19:27:41  12  ORDER BY crr_s_svmd - crr_l_svmd
19:27:41  13  /
